mapper.select: SELECT UPM.PRODUCT_NO, PRD.PRODUCTNAME, (COUNT(*) * 3000) PRODUCTAMT FROM USERPERMISSIONS UPM LEFT OUTER JOIN PRODUCTS PRD ON UPM.PRODUCT_NO = PRD.PRODUCT_NO WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY UPM.PRODUCT_NO, PRD.PRODUCTNAME ORDER BY PRODUCTAMT DESC

SELECT UPM.USER_NO, u.USERNAME, (COUNT(*) * 3000) USERAMT FROM USERPERMISSIONS UPM LEFT OUTER JOIN USERS U ON UPM.user_NO = u.user_NO WHERE 1 = 1 GROUP BY UPM.user_NO, u.USERNAME ORDER BY USERAMT DESC
